variable.comment: and subtract this to get Y = 0
variable.name: ty

sub-events.comment: Creating inventory slots and and setting the values ​​of the variables according to the data in the array
If item ID in this array cell > 0, then item is exists and we need to create it
Also, if number of this item is > 0, then we need to create Text object to display this number

variable.comment: and subtract this to get Y = 0
